statements: DELETE FROM gaming_accessories_pricing WHERE id = 1 AND accessory_name = 'Keyboard';
DELETE FROM gaming_accessories_pricing WHERE price > 100 AND discount < 0.2;
DELETE FROM accessory_categories WHERE accessory_id IN (SELECT accessory_id FROM gaming_accessories WHERE price > 100);
DELETE FROM products WHERE category_id = 2 AND price > 100.00;
DELETE FROM accessories WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price > 500.00;
DELETE FROM accessory_categories WHERE accessory_id = 1 AND category_id = 2;
DELETE FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 500 AND order_date > '2022-01-01';
